page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN UTTOXETER CONT
page.content: INDUSTRY There is only one large scale manufacturing concern in Uttoxeter today and the evidence shows that the structure of industry is overwhelmingly dependent on services. This reflects the functions performed by a small market town for its rural hinterland... The total number of companies in Uttoxeter is 43 excluding sole trades in retailing and premises employing under 10 people. The percentage breakdown is 9.3% secondary sector activities (4 out of 43) and 91,7% tertiary sector activities (39 out of 43). A sample of the industry in the town is shown in the table. Uttoxeter's low level of unemployment may in part be attributed to the stability of the service sector.
